iati-activity.description: Fiji Renewable Energy Power Project. The project focuses on the removal of barriers (policy, regulatory, market, finance, and technical) to the wide-scale use of RE resources for grid-connected power generation in Fiji.

result.title: goal
result.description: Reduction of greenhouse gas emissions from Fijiâ€™s power sector.

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: Cumulative greenhouse gas emission reduction from power generation in Fiji by the end of project (EOP), ktons CO2

result.title: Objective
result.description: Removal of major barriers to the widespread and cost-effective use of grid-based renewable energy supply via commercially viable renewable energy technologies

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:
Cumulative installed new private sector-owned RE-based power generation capacity by EOP, MW
Share of RE in Fijiâ€™s power generation mix by EOP, %
Cumulative electricity production from RE-based power generation plants by EOP, GWh

result.title: Outcome 1
result.description: Facilitation of investments on energy projects, particularly on RE and biomass based power generation

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: Cumulative investment on RE-based power generation by EOP, US$ million

result.title: Outcome 2
result.description: Technical feasibility of harnessing RE resources are ascertained and made widely known

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:
No. of identified technically viable RE projects EOP
No. of investors that made use of available technical information on feasible RE-based energy system projects by EOP

result.title: Outcome 3
result.description: Markets for specific renewable energy technologies are supported

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:
No. of additional rural households that have access to green electricity by EOP.
No. of financial closures achieved for new RE-based power generation projects by EOP
No. of RET system equipment/component suppliers & distributors in Fiji by EOP
Overall volume of business in the RE market in Fiji by EOP, US$ million

result.title: Outcome 4
result.description: Renewable Energy developments integrated into National Energy Plan towards 100% Electrification of Fiji.

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:
Cabinet approved-Electrification Master Plan
Average annual budget for the Electrification Master Plan by EOP, US$ million
% utilization of Fijiâ€™s RE resources (for power purposes) by EOP

actual.comment:
Not applicable for reporting period
Not applicable for reporting period
80%

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:
No. of proposed articles on the Energy Bill that are endorsing RE-based power generation in Fiji
A cabinet-approved comprehensive Energy Act promulgated
Institutional reform of DOE to effectively administer the Fiji Energy legislation

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:
No. of specific IRRs enforced by EOP
No. of revised IRRs proposed to enhance Energy Act implementation by EOP

result.title: Output 1.3
result.description: Government agencies with enhanced regulatory and institutional capacity on energy development, in general, and RE development in particular

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:
No. of RE regulations and legal frameworks administered by DoE senior staff for IPP projects and rural electrification by EOP
%. of approved RE-based power generation projects that are fully-compliant with DOE-administered RE regulatory and legal frameworks by EOP

actual.comment:
1- Discussions underway to use Bukuya mini Hydro as the pilot project Site.
Work in progress

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:

% of clearinghouse and central energy database system clients each year that are satisfied with the services received

result.title: Output 2.2
result.description: Completed and published RE resource assessments

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description:
